name: Arun
desc: Arun is an Economist, passionate about #OpenData and its potential to increase state transparency and accountability. He believes in empowering state agencies to make policy decisions based on the best available evidence. Loves teaching. Previously worked at NITI Aayog.

name: Gaurav Godhwani
desc: Gaurav works to strengthen the data-for-good ecosystem in India, he has been instrumental in starting initiatives like DataKind Bangalore & Open Budgets India. He is passionate about Open Data, Open Source Tech, Education and Human Rights.

name: Preethi
desc: Preethi is a biologist. Having worked in the pharmaceutical industry for over five years, she has an interest in public health statistics. She is particularly keen on the use of open government data toward public health statistics. She enjoys running, reading books, going on bicycle rides and watching anime.

name: Shreya Agrawal
desc: Shreya Agrawal is a data fanatic who loves to scrutinize data as well as answering unanswered questions using visualizations. She also enjoys developing softwares.

name: Swati
desc: Swati is an Open Source enthusiast. She is passionate about the social impact of technology and works to add her contribution to the same. She has previously worked with Scrapinghub.

name: Abrar Burk
desc: Abrar is a UX Designer & Creative Technologist. He researches, strategizes, facilitates, communicates, designs, codes, and does whatever else it takes to bring web & mobile applications to life. He speaks with people in English & Hindi and he speaks with machines in a few JavaScript dialects & PHP.

name: Simonti
desc: Simonti is a researcher in the domain of public finance and is with the Centre for Budget and Governance Accountability. She has been an integral part of the Open Budgets India team.

name: Sheneille Patil
desc: Sheneille is a UI + UX Designer. She designs digital products for users with a close eye on form and function. She has worked on several digital projects, across different industries with the focus on conceptualizing, strategizing and execution of designs.
